name: Car Manufacturing
Description: ● A Full-stack website where you have the admin dashboard and user dashboard.● Support CRUD Operation.● To Place an Order, Users have to log in with a google account.

name: Grocery Store
Description: ● The site is a full-stack website. A login user can add-products and delete products.● Users have to log in with an Email and Google account.● If you want to login with email, the user's email will also be a verification email

name: Surgical Care
Description: ● This is the Surgical Care site. When you click the checkout button you will be taken to the checkout page.● log in system by firebase authentication .● The routing system applies with react-router
